did.unittitle: Connecticut Soldiers Collection, Harlan P. Rugg Papers.
did.abstract: Captain Harlan P. Rugg of Winchester Center, Connecticut, maintained a lengthy diary account of his activities from 1861 through 1864, describing many of the major battles of the conflict.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Captain Harlan P. Rugg of Winchester Center, Connecticut, served with Company F, 5th Connecticut Volunteers from 1861 through 1864.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains four diaries detailing many of the major battles of the Civil War.
